backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining SurgeryCase, Task, TaskOptions, UserProfile, and OpenAIConfig types with CRUD operations for cases, user profiles, and access control using MixinAuthorization; includes dashboard query for open tasks count.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three features (voice recording fix, parse-and-fill button fix, and date parsing enhancement) to their implementation files and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of frontend TypeScript/React files covering authentication, case management, validation, search, CSV import/export, and UI components with Task/TaskOptions type usage details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA manifest, favicon links, theme color meta tags, and Apple mobile web app configuration for the SurgiPaw application.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, display mode (standalone), theme colors, and start URL for SurgiPaw veterinary surgery case management app.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy for static assets with precaching of app shell, runtime caching for JS/CSS/images, and exclusion of Internet Identity and API calls from caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component with Internet Identity authentication, view routing (dashboard/cases/settings), profile setup modal, admin-only settings access, case navigation from dashboard, and forced light theme enforcement.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout, error handling for duplicate authentication, and primary/outline button styling based on auth state.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, using a form with validation and mutation hook to save the profile.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines checklist items (discharge notes, labs, imaging, etc.) with configuration for task selection/completion fields, default values, colors, and utility functions to calculate task progress and styling.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Displays a surgery case card with editable notes, task checklist with color-coded badges, edit/delete actions, and handles task completion updates with confirmation dialogs.
Dialog form for creating/editing surgery cases with fields for patient info, AI-powered text parsing, speech recognition, MRN-based case lookup for prefilling, and task checklist configuration.
Main list view component that displays filtered and sorted surgery cases with search, species/task filters, CSV import/export, and handles case selection with scroll-to-highlight behavior.
Search input component with search icon and clear button for filtering cases by any field.
Dropdown select control for sorting cases using predefined sort options with an icon indicator.
Popover filter with checkboxes for selecting species to filter cases, persists selections to session storage, and shows active filter count badge.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completion status, with session storage persistence and a badge showing active filter count.
A checklist component that displays task items with checkboxes, supporting both creation mode (selecting tasks) and completion mode (marking tasks complete), with color-coded borders.
A panel component providing CSV export and import functionality for surgery cases, with progress tracking, error handling, and support for both creating new cases and updating existing ones.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component with calendar picker that formats dates as MM/DD/YYYY, auto-inserts slashes during typing, validates input, and auto-advances to the next field on completion.
Core CSV import/export logic that converts surgery cases to/from CSV format, validates data, handles parsing errors, and matches imported cases with existing records by medical record number.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema with 17 columns for surgery case data, including headers, validation constants for species/sex/boolean values, and comprehensive documentation of expected formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides filtering functions for surgery cases by species, task types, task completion status, and whether all tasks are completed or not.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide voice-to-text transcription with recording state, error handling, and browser compatibility checks.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors (O/0, I/1/l confusion), and removing artifacts as a fallback for text cleaning.
Parses structured text in label:value format to extract case information fields (MRN, owner, pet name, dates, species, sex, breed, complaint) with support for voice dictation variations.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates a printable PDF report of surgery cases with remaining tasks using an iframe and the browser's native print functionality without external dependencies.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of surgery cases including all fields and remaining tasks, with proper CSV field escaping and timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utilities for PDF display, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds) to date strings and enums (Species, Sex) to readable text, plus text truncation and task list formatting.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides formatting utilities for CSV reports, converting Time (bigint nanoseconds) to date strings and enums (Species, Sex) to readable text for export.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Implements case search functionality that filters surgery cases by matching query strings against basic fields (MRN, pet name, owner, species, etc.) and incomplete checklist tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file, likely a placeholder for future AI image analysis service implementation.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Provides sorting functionality for surgery cases with options for arrival date (newest/oldest) and open task count (most/fewest), using checklist items to calculate remaining tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types and constants for case forms, including species options (canine/feline/other), sex options (male/female with neutered/spayed variants), and the CaseFormData interface.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Contains validation functions for case form fields (MRN, pet name, owner name, breed) and utility functions for date parsing/formatting and converting between Date objects and nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard component that displays a filterable, searchable, and sortable list of surgery cases with task status indicators, species badges, and navigation to individual cases or PDF generation.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open tasks from surgery cases and calculate total open task counts across all cases using the checklist items system.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Settings page component for configuring OpenAI API key with validation status display, secure input field with show/hide toggle, and save functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, handling actor initialization and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom React hook that debounces a changing value with configurable delay (default 500ms) using setTimeout and cleanup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on surgery cases, including fetching all cases, fetching by MRN, creating, and updating cases with task options and detailed logging.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a light blue color scheme for the application, including special styling for patient names, species fields, presenting complaints, and notes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript type definitions for Tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker interface, recognition options, result structures, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both standard query strings and hash-based routing with parameter persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, and enabling dark mode with typography and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a veterinary case management application with known issues in voice recording transcription (populating wrong field) and Parse and Fill button (not extracting fields correctly).
